com.orchestranetworks.service.directory
Class DirectoryFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.orchestranetworks.service.directory.DirectoryFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectoryDefaultFactory
public abstract class DirectoryFactory
extends Object

Factory for the user and roles directory.

Configuration

The directory to be used by EBX5 is specified by the property ebx.directory.factory in the EBX5 main configuration file.

If not specified, the default factory is DirectoryDefaultFactory.

Deployment

This class and its associated classes must be accessible from the class-loader that contains ebx.jar.

See Also:
Custom directory

Creates the directory.
